sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Luciferase Limited Use Label License Takara Bio Limited Use Label License (formerly Clontech)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: Syn-ATP was a gift from Timothy Ryan (Addgene plasmid # 51819 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:51819 ; RRID:Addgene_51819)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Activity-driven local ATP synthesis is required for synaptic function. Rangaraju V, Calloway N, Ryan TA. Cell. 2014 Feb 13;156(4):825-35. doi: 10.1016/j.cell.2013.12.042. 10.1016/j.cell.2013.12.042 PubMed 24529383
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:mutation: Within WT luciferase gene, changed Threonine 214 to Alanine, changed Alanine 215 to Leucine, changed Isoleucine 232 to Alanine, changed Phenylalanine 295 to Leucine, changed Glutamic Acid 354 to Lysine, changed Isoleucine 423 to Leucine, and changed Aspartic Acid 436 to Glycine.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Human CMV immediate early promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CMV-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV-F

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF: mutant luciferase from B.R. Branchini, U. Conn

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for the E. coli lac operon
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac promoter
CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: CAP binding activates transcription in the presence of cAMP.
